comment.body:
I don't know if ends up overall good or bad, but when the users don't know the stuff they're using, they are still under control: their apps' developers (and whoever can influence them). Well, to a degree that's unavoidable; but i'm not seeing any benefits in trying to build a wall between developers and users: it did enough harm already.

In particular i don't like how many free software developers these days (including e.g. aforementioned Signal) don't even put a link to source code from their "landing page"
